rows.label: tev000794_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey, [ST:playername ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0002
rows.name: Check it out! I just bought a new car![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0003
rows.name: Well? Pretty nice, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_JNK0010
rows.name: Nod[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_SEL0011
rows.name: Stare enviously at Doug's new ride.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Doug why he bought a car.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_JNK0030
rows.name: Joke[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Doug if he'll use it on his Harrier missions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0004
rows.name: I know, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0005
rows.name: And it wasn't as expensive as you might think![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0006
rows.name:
Graham owed me a favor, so he sold it to me way
below cost.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0007
rows.name: What for? What do you THINK?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0008
rows.name:
New LA's only gonna grow bigger and bigger, right?
Even just shopping without a car is gonna be a real
hassle one of these days.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0009
rows.name:
And it's not like you can drive your Skell everywhere.
The fuel economy would be terrible, for one.
And parking? Forget it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0010
rows.name: Er, are you serious?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0011
rows.name:
If I took this thing outside of New LA, it'd be a pile of
scrap within about five minutes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0012
rows.name:
It's a great car and all, but I'll stick with Skells when
I'm on the job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0013
rows.name: So what kind of car would you want to buy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_JNK0040
rows.name: Sports Car[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_SEL0041
rows.name: Say a high-performance, two-passenger car.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_JNK0050
rows.name: SUV[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_SEL0051
rows.name: Say a large sport-utility vehicle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_JNK0060
rows.name: Bus[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_SEL0061
rows.name: Say a big bus that seats 40. ...With a huge wheel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0014
rows.name: I see you and I have a common hobby.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0015
rows.name:
You just can't fully appreciate the open road without a
proper sports car.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0016
rows.name:
Only problem is that you gotta watch the speed limits
around here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0017
rows.name:
They come down especially hard on us BLADEs,
and the fines are usually a small fortune.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0018
rows.name:
Yeah, it's not my cup of tea, but I can see where
you're coming from.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0019
rows.name:
With four-wheel drive, you could probably take Elma
and Lin off-roading on the plains of Primordia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0020
rows.name:
Course, the indigens would reduce it to scrap within
10 minutes, but it would be a FUN ten minutes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0021
rows.name: A...bus?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0022
rows.name:
You planning to pack up Elma and Lin and the rest
of the gang and take 'em on a trip somewhere?
Is this some kind of hippy thing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0023
rows.name:
Heck, your team would barely fill up the first couple
rows! You'd have room for pretty much everyone you
know in New LA if you wanted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0024
rows.name: Heh! Guess you're the more-the-merrier type, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0025
rows.name:
It's kinda interesting how you can tell so much about
someone's personality from the car they want to drive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0026
rows.name: I bet Lao used to drive an SUV.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0027
rows.name: He probably used it to go camping with his family.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0028
rows.name:
I wish we still lived in a peaceful world like that,
but I imagine we won't be back there for a long time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000794_MSG0029
rows.name:
Well, at least I can still enjoy a brief drive during my
breaks! Anyway, take care, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]
